item.title: Self Introduction
item.description: Self Introduction I am Mai Pham. I come from Vietnam and I lived there for 22 years. I have a bachelor’s degree in International Business Management and some industry experience in banking and accounting, both in Vietnam and the US, before I went to Columbia to pursue my dream, to learn and leverage an analytical and technological approach in various management problems, which is why I’m here, as a first-year Master’s student in Operations Research.
